import React from 'react'; const Stats = () => { const geographicalFootprint = [ { number: "4", label: "South-West States", details: "Lagos, Ogun, Oyo, Ondo" }, { number: "1", label: "North-Central", details: "Abuja (FCT)" }, { number: "1", label: "South-East State", details: "Imo" }, { number: "3", label: "Northern States", details: "Kano, Jigawa, Adamawa" } ]; return (
{geographicalFootprint.map((region, index) => (
{region.number}

{region.label}

{region.details}
))}
); }; export default Stats;
